name: Latest Teen Patti - Poker Game
description:
Install instructions

This card game will be instantly familiar to fans of Texas Hold’em Poker, blackjack or other card games. Play a game of teen patti online free with your friends, family or anyone else worldwide!

Latest Teen Patti Features:

11. Latest teen patti rules means simple, strategic gameplay that everyone will love!
12. Smooth, responsive, rich graphics and fast magical casino experience.

Cards are ranked as follows (From High to low):

1. Trail/Trio/Three of a kind: Three cards of the same rank.
2. Pure Sequence/Pure run/Straight Flush: Three consecutive cards of the same suit.
3. Sequence/Normal Run/Straight: Three consecutive cards not all in the same suit.
4. Color/Flush: Three cards of the same suit that are not in sequence.
5. Pair/Two of a kind: Two cards of the same rank.
6. High Card: Three cards that do not belong to any of the above types.

Terms of app use. 

1. All chips are company assets. 
2. LTP is a fun game nobody can collect and sale the chips. 
3. Chip collection and chip laundering is illegal.
4. Multiple i'd illegal.

6. Coin limit (10^19) - If your coins cross the maximum threshold then they automatically convert to zero. So, keep this thing in mind. Have fun :) 

That’s all you need to know to start playing teen patti!
